descriptionHtml:
I am learning how to use the creation kit so I thought I would start with something relatively easy. I have added three new wives.

#1: Ruma - A Highelf guard in Windhelm. She was raised by Nords near Windhelm after her parents were killed. Ashamed of the way the Dominion treats the people of Skyrim she wanted to help in some way so she joined the guards to protect Windhelm and Ulfric.

That is just my story for her anyway. No story in game. She can be found in the Windhelm Marketplace.

#2: Shargra - An Orc located in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

#3: Una - A Woodelf located in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

#4: Zanita - A Khajiit located at the Bee an Barb in Riften. This is an optional file.

Nothing fancy just talk to them with an Amulet of Mara. I used vanilla everything so no other mods required.

I do use

Decent Women - improve female npcs face - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14443/?
and
UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?

For the Khajiit I use

Feminine Khajiit Textures for CBBE-UNP (Grey Cat and Leopard)(I use the Grey Cat option) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62193/?
and
MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage  - www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36913/
and
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

So depending on your set up might not look the same.

Required

Skyrim
Update
Hearthfire

And for the Khajiit

MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage
ApachiiSkyHair

I may add more depending on how things go. If you have a wife request just post and let me know. I don't mind..
author: GrimKusanagi
